Class ColorThresholder

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

          • java.awt.Frame
            • ij.plugin.frame.PlugInFrame
              • ij.plugin.frame.ColorThresholder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Measurements, PlugIn, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.AdjustmentListener, java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ColorThresholder
extends PlugInFrame
implements PlugIn, Measurements, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.AdjustmentListener, java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.lang.Runnable
    Selects pixels according to hsb or rgb components.
    See Also:

      • RGBtoLab

        public static void RGBtoLab()
        Converts the current image from RGB to CIE L*a*b* and stores the results in the same RGB image R=L*, G=a*, B=b*. Values are therfore offset and rescaled. see: http://www.brucelindbloom.com/index.html?WorkingSpaceInfo.html#Specifications http://www.easyrgb.com/math.php?MATH=M7#text7 Author: Gabriel Landini, G.Landini@bham.ac.uk

      • RGBtoYUV

        public static void RGBtoYUV()
        Converts the current image from RGB to YUV and stores the results in the same RGB image R=Y, G=U, B=V. Author: Gabriel Landini, G.Landini@bham.ac.uk
